FuncDef: This command configures the intercept-id inserted in the packet header for all mirrored packets of the associated li-source. When the mirror service is configured with theip-udp-shimroutable encapsulation, the intercept-id field (as part of the routable encap) is always present in the mirrored packets. The intercept ID can be used by the LIG to identify a particular LI session to which the packet belongs.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the intercept ID inserted in the LI header.
